title: All
lyrics:
I'm done waiting and that's on everything I love. 2018 ain't gonna be about nothing else, just Vasi shit. Y'all niggas think I'm playing okay
All the weak niggas Imma send em to y'all
I'm here to save the game like a memory card
Don't fall for the gimmicks they pretend to be hard
And I'm really from the gutter bitch

3's if you fuck with it

All my hoes the sluttiest

All my shows the chubbiest

Barely make enough to live so all my bros is hustling

Groupies really think I'm rich, I swear that's just the funniest

Bad little honey dip, butt and tits, tummy fixed

Vasi Gang captain really rapping on some mummy shit

All them others I ate weak i worked two months for this, get it?

Over heads like projectors

Save me with the lectures, raise the baby under pressure

I ain't [?] first, popping off a verse

Fans copping all the merch

Flow so godly need to drop me off at church

I really hope it works

Marco what's the deally he get sill off the perks

When my friends left I got chilly on this Earth

New bitch look like [?], some Nike and some knee-highs

Made it on my own, I stand alone like a Kiosk

Papa was a rolling stone he never came to see us

Everybody throwing 3's you dweebs wanna be us

It's time for the re-ups, no more fighting over peanuts

It ain't no payments for the clean ups

I want it all

I gotta have it all

I'm back y'all

Yo why these lousy niggas hating tell em back off

I hear em barking but they pussies just like cat, dog

And quit calling your shit rap if you don't rap dog

One of the greatest alive this ain't no accident

Fans hear my anthems and they kneel just like Kaepernick

Relax till the mac gets to airing like some Packer shit

Smash and tell her pack her shit, I'm back up on my rapper shit

And I'm sick off all the cheap talking

Bitch I'm living out a dream I feel like I'm sleep walking

But I stay up on my grind so I don't sleep often

Attention seeking for no reason better stay cautious

Remain flawless, this is mine better claim all this

I can't call it, money good but the pain awful

You can't pause it, we're live in action

And only God can grasp it, that's how it happens



Straight up 3's

It's Fly America

3's up

Vasi World
